data.lyric:
[ti:drunk face (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly]
[al:Tickets To My Downfall (Explicit)]
[by:]

[00:00.00]drunk face (Explicit) - Machine Gun Kelly (机关枪凯利)
[00:01.45]Lyrics by：Travis Barker/Omer Fedi/Nick Mira/Nick Long/Colson Baker
[00:02.91]Composed by：Travis Barker/Omer Fedi/Nick Mira/Nick Long/Colson Baker
[00:04.36]I'm still young wasting my youth
[00:07.20]I'll grow up next summer
[00:09.67]I'm back on those d**gs I quit
[00:12.48]I kept my dealer's number
[00:15.07]I'm still young wasting my youth
[00:17.78]I'll grow up next summer
[00:20.33]I'm back on that girl I quit
[00:23.11]I should've lost her number
[00:26.22]I'm overcompensating for heartbreak
[00:28.59]I swallowed the pill that was in a heart shape
[00:31.19]Her hands on my chest feelin' my heartbeat
[00:33.78]She spillin' her drink all on my car seat
[00:36.63]She'll get attached and then trap me
[00:39.16]Then I gotta act like I'm happy
[00:41.96]She posts pics to get at me
[00:44.74]Déjà vu it's like last week
[00:47.14]I'm still young wasting my youth
[00:49.75]I'll grow up next summer
[00:52.30]I'm back on those d**gs I quit
[00:55.11]I kept my dealer's number
[00:57.65]I'm still young wasting my youth
[01:00.35]I'll grow up next summer
[01:03.03]I'm back on that girl I quit
[01:05.78]I should've lost her number
[01:08.83]Pedal to the floor yeah I can't brake
[01:11.18]The floor of the hotels my ashtray
[01:13.80]She opened the door and walked past me
[01:16.39]I'm a Hollywood w***e I don't ask names
[01:19.00]Yeah let's get high as f**k
[01:21.71]I try to cover up
[01:24.37]Eyes that have seen too much
[01:27.08]I'd go blind for her touch
[01:29.68]I'm still young wasting my youth
[01:32.44]I'll grow up next summer
[01:35.06]I'm back on those d**gs I quit
[01:37.82]I kept my dealer's number
[01:40.40]I'm still young wasting my youth
[01:43.17]I'll grow up next summer
[01:45.71]I'm back on that girl I quit
[01:48.51]I should've lost her number
[01:50.97]I'm still young I'm wasted and I'm not getting younger
[01:56.38]I'll grow up I promise that I'll grow up next summer
[02:01.63]I'm still young I'm wasted and I'm not getting younger
[02:06.09]You plus me is euphoria
[02:07.18]I'll grow up I promise that I'll grow up next summer
[02:09.83]I have sinned oh help me Jesus
[02:12.53]I'm still young I'm wasted and I'm not getting younger
[02:15.12]You plus me is euphoria
[02:17.58]I'll grow up I promise that I'll grow up next summer
[02:19.80]I have sinned oh help me Jesus
data.trans:
[ti:drunk face (Explicit)]
[ar:Machine Gun Kelly]
[al:Tickets To My Downfall (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.45]//
[00:02.90]//
[00:04.36]我还有大把青春可以浪费
[00:07.20]我会等到明年夏天再长大
[00:09.67]我要重新染上戒掉的瘾
[00:12.48]我还把地下贩子的号码捏在手里
[00:15.07]我还有大把青春可以浪费
[00:17.78]我会等到明年夏天再长大
[00:20.33]我要重新找回那个跟我分手的女孩
[00:23.11]我应该已经把她的号码删去
[00:26.22]我心跳过速
[00:28.59]我把心型的药片吞下了肚
[00:31.19]她的双手放在我的胸口 感受我心的搏动 
[00:33.78]她把她的饮料全洒在了我的车座
[00:36.63]她会爱上我 然后引诱我陷入爱中
[00:39.16]我还要装作自己好像乐在其中
[00:41.96]她在网上放那些照片就是为了勾引我
[00:44.74]似曾相识 好像回到了上周
[00:47.14]我还有大把青春可以浪费
[00:49.75]我会等到明年夏天再长大
[00:52.30]我要重新染上戒掉的瘾
[00:55.11]我还把地下贩子的号码捏在手里
[00:57.65]我还有大把青春可以浪费
[01:00.35]我会等到明年夏天再长大
[01:03.03]我要重新找回那个跟我分手的女孩
[01:05.78]我应该已经把她的号码删去
[01:08.83]加大油门 对 我不能刹车
[01:11.18]酒店的地板 我的烟灰缸
[01:13.80]她打开门 从我身边走过
[01:16.39]我是个眼里只有名利的小人 我不在意别人姓甚名谁
[01:19.00]让我们一起潇洒快活
[01:21.71]我想要盖住她的身体
[01:24.37]已经领略过太多她的美丽
[01:27.08]我要为了感受她的触碰而闭上眼睛
[01:29.68]我还有大把青春可以浪费
[01:32.44]我会等到明年夏天再长大
[01:35.06]我要重新染上戒掉的瘾
[01:37.82]我还把地下贩子的号码捏在手里
[01:40.40]我还有大把青春可以浪费
[01:43.17]我会等到明年夏天再长大
[01:45.71]我要重新找回那个跟我分手的女孩
[01:48.51]我应该已经把她的号码删去
[01:50.97]我还有青春可以浪费 错过了就没有下一次机会
[01:56.38]我会成熟长大 我保证我会在明年夏天变成大人
[02:01.63]我还有青春可以浪费 错过了就没有下一次机会
[02:06.09]你我相伴就感觉无比欢欣
[02:07.18]我会成熟长大 我保证我会在明年夏天变成大人
[02:09.83]我犯下了罪行 救救我 耶稣
